title: Pre- Code | Bird of Paradise (1932, Romance) directed by King Vidor | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Pre- Code | Bird of Paradise (1932, Romance) directed by King Vidor | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
A native girl falls for a young American visitor to her island, leading to cultural clashes and dramatic consequences. But she's chosen to be sacrificed to the volcano god.

Original title: Bird of Paradise (1932)

Black & White original version: https://youtu.be/gaxb159hRsY

This film is available with English, Italian, Russian & Spanish audio options.  
And subtitled in many more languages.

Director: King Vidor
Writers: Richard Walton Tully, Wells Root, Wanda Tuchock
Stars: Dolores del Rio, Joel McCrea, John Halliday, Creighton Lon Chaney Jr
Genres: Colorized classics, Adventure, Drama, Romance


00:00 Full Movie with subtitles
01:37 Romantic adventure on a tropical island with encounters, sailing, and cultural immersion.
07:01 Romantic adventure in a tropical setting with cultural taboos and a dangerous encounter with a shark.
15:47 A group of people discuss the whereabouts of a young man named Johnny, who is missing from the boat.
22:34 A chaotic and comedic scene unfolds as characters interact in a tropical setting, leading to a series of misunderstandings and mishaps.
48:20 Exploration of a new civilization and the clash of beliefs and desires in a romantic setting.
54:40 Romantic drama unfolds as Johnny and Luana navigate challenges and confront Pele's wrath.
1:14:36 A romantic drama set in 1932 involving cultural differences, family expectations, and a love triangle.
